      üåø LeafCareBot - AI-powered Plant Diagnosis and Chatbot

      1 minute read

      A FastAPI backend service that helps users diagnose plant diseases from images and provides gardening advice through an AI chatbot.

      Live API on Render Source

      üöÄ Features

      • üå± Plant Diagnosis: Upload a leaf image and detect potential diseases using AI models.
      • üí¨ AI Chatbot: Chat with an AI assistant for plant care tips.
      • üîí Authentication: Register and login system with JWT token security.
      • üóÑÔ∏è Database: PostgreSQL integration using SQLAlchemy and Alembic for migrations.
      • üåê Deployment: Hosted on Render (free tier).

      ‚öôÔ∏è Technologies Used

      • Python 3.11
      • FastAPI
      • PostgreSQL
      • SQLAlchemy
      • Alembic
      • Pydantic
      • JWT Authentication
      • TensorFlow / PyTorch (for AI models)
      • Uvicorn (ASGI Server)

      Work FLow

      üõ†Ô∏è Getting Started

      1. Clone the repository

      git clone https://github.com/tantran1011/LeafCareBot.git
cd LeafCareBot

      2. Install dependencies

      pip install -r requirements.txt

      3.Set up environment variables (Optional)

      Create a .env file for secret keys, database URLs, etc. (if needed).

      4. Run the app locally

      uvicorn main:app --reload

      The API will be available at: http://127.0.0.1:8000

      üìö API Endpoints

      Method Endpoint Description
      POST /auth/register Register a new user
      POST /auth/login Login and receive JWT token
      POST /chat/chatbot Send a message to the AI chatbot
      POST /diagnosis/diagnosis_plant Upload a plant image for disease prediction

      You can test the endpoints using Postman or directly through the Swagger UI: üëâ Swagger UI

      üé® Frontend (Optional)

      Basic index.html is available inside the static/ folder. In production, the root endpoint / will serve this page.

      ‚ú® Future Improvements

      • Add detailed disease care guides based on diagnosis results.
      • Improve chatbot‚Äôs understanding with fine-tuned models.
      • Create a full frontend UI for better user experience.
